features.name: Add trademark symbol to Digital Midstream mentions
features.description: Add ™ symbol above every mention of 'Digital Midstream' throughout the website
tests: Verify all Digital Midstream mentions have ™ symbol

features.name: Clean up footer design - make text smaller and more sleek

features.recommendation: Polish when core features are complete
tests: Compare footer design to industry standards

features.name: Create sitemap.xml and configure AI crawler access
features.description: Create sitemap.xml for SEO and configure robots.txt/Cloudflare to allow AI crawlers (GPTBot, ClaudeBot, PerplexityBot) for AEO optimization

tests: Verify Gas Processing & H2S Treatment is removed from all pages

tests: Verify all blog articles are migrated

features.name: Create rational internal linking throughout website
